metadata.title: CVE-2022-34033 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
HTMLDoc v1.9.15 was discovered to contain a heap overflow via(write_header) /htmldoc/htmldoc/html.cxx:273.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-34033` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

htmldoc - 1.9.2-1ubuntu0.2+esm2
htmldoc-common - 1.9.2-1ubuntu0.2+esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: htmldoc package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.9.2-1ubuntu0.2+esm2').
